top_problem_solved: We've always focused on being a 'solution provider' rather than just being someone who sells products. Hence with every customer we have worked with, we have always identified their need or pain point and guided them towards making the right product choice/solution to achieve 100% customer satisfaction
my_favourite_bni_story: Through BNI, I’ve learned that real business happens when we genuinely build relationships. A perfect example of this came when I was invited to an event of a BNI member. The member and I had actually become good friends after we worked together in a tenure where he was the chapter president and I was the chapter director. The event was a private destination wedding of his with only the inner circle of the couple being invited. There, I had the opportunity to connect casually with a leading entrepreneur who owns multiple hotels. What started as a simple conversation turned into a meaningful connection. We bonded over some of our travel experiences—and never once talked “business” at the start. Weeks later, that relationship naturally grew into a business opportunity. Today, we’re proud to be supplying curtains and blinds across several of their hotel properties. It’s a reminder that in BNI, when we focus on giving, connecting, and building trust, the results follow—sometimes in the most unexpected ways.

name: Karthikeyan Gowthaman
top_product: Custom Website Design, Responsive Web Design, User Experience (UX) Design, Visual Design and Branding, E-commerce Website Design, Content Management Systems (CMS), Keyword Research and Optimization, On-Page Optimization, Technical SEO Audit, and Implementation, Link Building and Outreach,
ideal_referral: Digital Marketing Companies, SEO Companies, Social Media Companies
top_problem_solved: Outdated and Unappealing Design: One common problem businesses face is having outdated or unappealing website designs that fail to engage visitors. Website design services address this issue by creating modern and visually appealing designs that align with the brand's identity and target audience. By incorporating attractive layouts, intuitive navigation, and eye-catching visuals, businesses can create a positive first impression and enhance user engagement. Poor User Experience (UX): A website that provides a poor user experience can lead to high bounce rates and low conversion rates. Website design services focus on improving UX by optimizing page load speed, ensuring mobile responsiveness, and simplifying navigation. By creating intuitive user interfaces and seamless interactions, businesses can enhance the overall user experience and encourage visitors to explore the website further. For instance, an e-commerce store may face high cart abandonment rates due to a complicated checkout process, which can be resolved by redesigning the process to be more streamlined and user-friendly Non-Responsive and Incompatible Design: In today's mobile-centric world, having a non-responsive website design can hinder the user experience on different devices and screen sizes. Website design services address this problem by creating responsive designs that adapt to various devices, ensuring optimal viewing experiences for users. This helps businesses avoid losing potential customers who may abandon a website that is not mobile-friendly. For example, a travel agency that lacks a mobile-responsive website design may lose out on bookings from users browsing on smartphones and tablets Low Search Engine Visibility: One of the most common challenges businesses face is low search engine visibility, where their website fails to rank well in search engine results pages (SERPs). Ineffective Keyword Targeting: Choosing the right keywords to target is crucial for SEO success.
my_favourite_bni_story: Brand Transformation: Working with a small startup, we embarked on a website design project to establish their brand identity and online presence. Through careful analysis of their target audience and market positioning, we crafted a visually stunning and user-friendly website that truly reflected their brand values. The new website not only attracted attention but also helped them gain credibility and establish themselves as a reputable player within their industry. The transformation was evident in increased website traffic, higher conversion rates, and positive customer feedback, enabling the business to thrive and expand its reach. E-commerce Conversion Boost: For an e-commerce client struggling with low conversion rates, we undertook a comprehensive website redesign with a focus on enhancing the user experience and optimizing the conversion funnel. By streamlining the navigation, simplifying the checkout process, and improving product page layouts, we created a seamless shopping experience that instilled confidence in customers and facilitated effortless transactions. The result was a significant boost in conversion rates, leading to increased online sales and revenue for the client. Client: XYZ Sweets & Snacks Shop XYZ Sweets & Snacks Shop was a local Sweets & Snacks Shop that had been struggling to generate online visibility and reach their target audience effectively. They approached us for SEO assistance to enhance their online presence and drive more traffic to their website. Thorough Analysis and Strategy Development: We began by conducting a comprehensive analysis of their website, target audience, and local competition. This analysis allowed us to identify opportunities and develop a tailored SEO strategy to meet their specific goals. Our strategy included keyword research, on-page optimization, local SEO tactics, and content marketing efforts.

ideal_referral: Apollo, Meenakshi Mission, Vadamalayan, Velammal, Devadoss, MIOT & Preethi Hospitals, Health clubs, Women's clubs, Business clubs like Lion's, Rotary, YES, JCI & YI
top_problem_solved: A patient aged 52, businessman came with low back pain, radiating pain in one of his legs, numbness in his feet, struggled to sit, stand and walk. He was referred to undergo surgery by 3 leading hospitals. I had given Physiotherapy & Acupuncture through House visit. Instructed him to be in Bed rest and educated him the Dos & Don'ts. He recovered completely in a month's time without surgery. He can do his routine activities of his own. A stroke patient, female, aged 63 paralysed on her right limbs and lost her speech. Post hospitalisation, I had given her a psychological counselling for her mental depression along with Acupuncture. She could speak normally and came well after 3 weeks.
my_favourite_bni_story: Mother of a BNI member who suffered from Cervical Radiculopathy (Neck pain with finger numbness), guiddiness, headache, disturbed sleep & indigestion. Treated her with a specific diet plan, physiotherapy especially manual therapy and acupuncture. She recovered completely within a month. Spouse of a BNI member had lumbar disc prolapse, Calf muscle cramp, skin rashes & constipation. Treated by House visiting physiotherapy, acupuncture and respective diet plan. She feels fully normal and able to do all the activities of her own. Based on their trust & hope, I got a chain of referrals in their apartment.
